value.name: Daniel Hernandez Jr. announces run for Congressional District 2 as Democrat
value.description: Rep. Daniel Hernandez Jr., a Democrat who represents District 2 in the Arizona Legislature, has announced that he is running for Congress in District 2.

value.name: Former Giffords intern Daniel Hernandez announces Congressional bid
value.description: Daniel Hernandez Jr. announced on Thursday, May 20, that he is running for Congress. He made the announcement on Twitter, saying “when I see a problem, I get to work to fix it.” The Tucson native is running for Congressional District 2.

value.name: Albemarle Police investigating weekend shooting at Whitewood Road apartment complex
value.description: Albemarle Police are investigating a weekend shooting in an apartment complex off Whitewood Road. Police were called to 2334 Peyton Drive, in the Parks Edge Apartments across from Humphris Park around 1:30 Saturday morning.

value.name: Daniel Hernandez enters growing Democratic field for Tucson-area congressional seat
value.description: State Rep. Daniel Hernandez is the third member of the Legislature to enter the race to replace Rep. Ann Kirkpatrick in a Tucson-based district.

value.name: LAPD shootings remained near historic low in 2020, but are up in 2021
value.description: LAPD officers opened fire 27 times last year, killing seven people. So far this year, officers have opened fire 16 times, killing six people.

value.name: The lowrider is back: The glorious return of cruising to the streets of L.A.
value.description: Have you noticed? Every weekend, caravans of lowriders and custom cars are cruising and hopping in a resurgent ritual. Van Nuys Boulevard is one of the city's oldest sites of this resilient SoCal obsession.
